item.title: US to boycott G20 in South Africa, Trump says
item.description: South Africa responded to the decision, saying the success of he summit won't "rest on one member state".

item.title: Storm declared 'super typhoon' as it hits Philippines
item.description: Typhoon Fung Wong is already bringing "life threatening conditions" to one eastern island, with widespread disruption expected later.

item.title: US authorities ground cargo plane model after Kentucky air disaster
item.description: Three firms told to stop operating MD-11 and MD-11F planes until safety checks are carried out.

item.title: More than 1,400 flights cancelled as US air traffic cuts enter second day
item.description: Thousands more flights have been delayed or cancelled as the reduction of air travel capacity continues during the federal government shutdown.

item.title: Thousands take to Lisbon streets over proposed labour laws
item.description: The government wants to make it easier for employers to fire people and to limit some compassionate leave.
